lender.name: McCulloch-Georgiou

lender.name: Ena
lender.loan_because: I want to alleviate poverty

lender.name: Deborah

lender.occupational_info: I have built a small business with the help of two partners. We assist other companies with finding locations for their construction projects.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I just read the book Half the Sky which made the needs of people, especially women so clear to me. I had to do something.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and get asked questions about something (how is my department doing financially, how many patients has my nursing unit seen over time, etc.) and I pull the information to answer that question.

lender.loan_because: We are Ian and Sue, and we loan because it seems like a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: Ian is a Power Plant Consultant and Sue is a homemaker. We are almost retired. Those are our grandchildren in the boat.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Nicky
lender.occupation: Faculty member at the University of Montana

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: It gives me joy to know I'm doing something to help someone improve the quality of their life.

lender.name: Guy & Eileen
lender.loan_because: My father was diagnosed with the big "C" in 2008 and passed away in 2009. He was a very kind man and often reminded me to think of those less fortunate than myself. He said if I had the means I should help those who are less privileged. I started this fund in 2009 with aim of helping others in memory of my father and father in-law . Friends or family thinking of buying birthday or Christmas gifts please donate to my Kiva account instead. Join Kiva and start lending.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Paula

lender.occupational_info: I sell products thru terms of 1 month to pay but much better if they paid it thru cash but here in the phils. much more sales if theres a terms of 2 gives to pay for ex. on the 15th & 30th they will pay. I sell products to office workers etc..

lender.loan_because: I am a believer in helping business people with their ventures. I have been blessed and I want to help someone pursue their dreams and aspirations!

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I want to do a good turn.

lender.name: Recycle Peace
lender.loan_because:
We believe in planting seeds of compassion -- to pave the path of PEACE. We want to restore, empower, and inspire the lives of the ordinary peoples in impoverished global regions, so that such individuals can contribute to the economic restoration and social sustainability of their community and native country.
We must be the change we want to see in the world. ~ Mahatma Gandhi . .

lender.name: Access Melbourne
lender.occupational_info: Access Melbourne is a network of employers in Melbourne, Australia working to promote sustainable transport. We are donating $1 to kiva for every person that signs up to our ridesharing program.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Microloans are a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research on open technologies like open source software, open courseware, open access to academic materials, and open educational resources of many types.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: Firstly, because God is a loving God and I hope that through me others may be able to feel God's love a little. Secondly, because I have a 2 year old girl and know how important it is to me that she has food, shelter and education. I want to help others to be able to provide that to their kids too.

lender.name: Ian Lai
lender.loan_because: We live in a world of abundance and to give is to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to grow, cook and eat nutritiously. Urban agriculture and food security all the way.

lender.occupational_info: I like playing soccer and I am interested in design. I wish to become a successful architect of some sort.

lender.name: Alan & Debbie
lender.loan_because: It's important to share and know that the smallest gesture can make a wold of difference. We are our brother's keeper.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: To share with others.

lender.name: Henry Davis York
lender.loan_because: we recognise our responsibilities towards our wider community and choose to support sustainable development and capacity building.
lender.occupational_info:
We are one of Australia's oldest and most successful commercial law firms with over 200 lawyers.
We work with the corporate sector, government and government-related organisations, and the financial services industry.
We provide pro bono assistance to disadvantaged and marginalised individuals and non-profit organisations who work for the public good.
We value people, our relationships, workplace spirit and excellence.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: Each and every day I work hard to pursue my dreams and make them reality. I know there are people in the world who want so bad to do the same, but just need someone to back them up. I'd like to focus on young entrepreneurs to help them make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student majoring in Journalism and Political Science, hoping to pursue a career in news reporting. I love to meet new people and explore new cultures, and I hope to one day travel the world and make that happen.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a fiber arts studio in Portland, ME as well as a sewing shop.

lender.occupational_info: I teach in a school for teens who have failed in school before and are now choosing to try again. I have seen that a willingness to work will take you farther than being smart.

lender.loan_because: We have seen the difference it makes in the lives of others.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Investing in determined entrepreneurs is one of the most direct ways to elevate poor people out of poverty. Engaging in small-scale efforts to eradicate poverty and hunger is a little, but significant, step towards reaching the Millennium Development Goals by 2015.
lender.occupational_info:
For my PhD I'm researching human security, food security and the impacts of foreign agricultural investment in Africa. For my fieldwork research I just spent 6 months in Kenya.
With Pacific Friends of the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, TB and Malaria I raise awareness of HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis and malaria in the Pacific region and advocate for increased investment in the innovative financing mechanism of the Global Fund.
